reqs:
Large Instrumental Ensemble - LRGE INST ENSEMB
UBC Concert Winds. May be repeated for credit in accordance with program requirements for B.Mus. or B.A. in Music. Open to other students by audition, with credit, as stipulated by their faculties. While every effort is made to place students in appropriate ensembles based upon audition results, those taking this course as an elective are advised to have an alternate course ready in the unlikely case where an ensemble placement is not available.
UBC Concert Winds
This concert band rehearses four hours per week, on Monday and Wednesday evenings, and makes approximately four performances each year. The majority of rehearsals and concerts take place in Chan Centre.
Open to both music and non-music majors performing on woodwinds, brass, or percussion. Entrance is by audition, taking place each September. Additional information regarding auditions, including downloadable excerpts for each instrument, can be found at www.music.ubc.ca/student-ensembles.html
courseName: Large Instrumental Ensemble - LRGE INST ENSEMB
description: Symphony Orchestra, Symphonic Wind Ensemble, or Concert Winds. May be repeated for credit in accordance with program requirements for B.Mus. or B.A. in Music. Open to other students by audition, with credit, as stipulated by their faculties.
